means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 萨奇地貌名称，或绰号，粗壮的人，来源于中世纪英语及古法语，含义是“树桩”(tree stump)

sentence.Network_en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentence.Network_cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentence.Network_en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentence.Network_cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentence.Network_en: Rather taken aback by such forwardness, I slammed down the phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此无礼的言语让我火冒三丈，我砰的一下把电话挂了。

One can ' t be a brute in such circumstances ., 一个人在这种情况下 , 不能全无心肝啊.

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... as stupid as an owl 极愚蠢 as such 同样地 as sure as a gun 的确.

lj.lj_ly: he had activities like the scouts and Sunday school and such.
lj.lj_ls: 他参加了童子军、主日学校等诸如此类的活动。

jx.jx_en_mean: [often with negative]in the exact sense of the word

lj.lj_ly: it is possible to stay overnight here although there is no guest house as such.
lj.lj_ls: 虽然没有严格意义上的旅店，但还是有可能在这过一夜的。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to refer vaguely to a person or thing that does not need to be specified

lj.lj_ly: so many enterprises to be sold by such-and-such a date.
lj.lj_ls: 要在某个日子出售的那么多的企业。

jx.jx_en_mean: what little there is; for what it's worth
jx.jx_cn_mean: 虽然质量（或价值）不过如此

lj.lj_ly: the plot, such as it is, takes road movie form.
lj.lj_ls: 情节虽不怎么样，却采用了流浪汉电影的形式。

lj.lj_ly: what was the reward for &B{such a one as} Fox?.
lj.lj_ls: 像福克斯这样的人得到了什么报应？。

lj.lj_ly: the linking of sentences such that they constitute a narrative.
lj.lj_ls: 组成一个叙事故事的句子连接。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English swilc, swylc; related to Dutch zulk, German solch, from the Germanic bases of so and alike

encyclopedia.content: 词性及解释 ? adj. 这样的， 这种， 某一 pron.这样的人锛埫秋級或物 例句 Such carpenter, such chip. 什么木匠出什么活。 Such as? 例如？ No such luck! 没那份运气！ One such round. 一圈每个人都打出一张牌的一轮 Such a narrative. 见闻录这样的叙述 比较so和 such ? 其规律由so与such的不同词性决定。such 是形容词，修饰名词或名词词组，so是副词，只能修饰形容词或副词。so 还可与表示数量的形容词many，few，much， li

entry.tran: 这样的;那样的;上述的;诸如此类的
entry.def: You use such to refer back to the thing or person that you have just mentioned, or a thing or person like the one that you have just mentioned. You use such as and such...as to introduce a reference to the person or thing that has just been mentioned.

example.ex: There have been previous attempts at coups. We regard such methods as entirely unacceptable...
example.tran: 以前也有人试图发动政变。我们绝对不能接受这种做法。

example.ex: You say you feel that you're being made to choose, and so you are. Such choices as this are a by-product of freedom...
example.tran: 你说自己感觉是在被迫作选择，确实如此，而这样的选择是自由的附带品。

entry.def: You use such...as to link something or someone with a clause in which you give a description of the kind of thing or person that you mean.

example.ex: Each member of the alliance agrees to take such action as it deems necessary, including the use of armed force...
example.tran: 该联盟的每一位成员国都同意采取其认为必要的行动，包括动用武力。

example.ex: Britain is not enjoying such prosperity as it was in the mid-1980s.
example.tran: 英国现在已经不像 20 世纪 80 年代中期那么繁荣昌盛。

entry.def: You use such...as to introduce one or more examples of the kind of thing or person that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: He was said to have written such books as The Day of Locusts and Miss Lonely Hearts.
example.tran: 据说他曾经写过《蝗虫之日》和《寂寞芳心小姐》之类的小说。

example.ex: ...such careers as teaching, nursing, hairdressing and catering.
example.tran: 教书、护理、美发和餐饮之类的工作

entry.tran: (用于名词词组前强调某事的程度或某事了不起)如此，这样，非常
entry.def: You use such before noun groups to emphasize the extent of something or to emphasize that something is remarkable.

example.ex: I think most of us don't want to read what's in the newspaper anyway in such detail...
example.tran: 我想我们大多数人无论如何都不想如此仔细地去读报纸。

example.ex: One will never be able to understand why these political issues can acquire such force...
example.tran: 人们永远也不会明白为什么这些政治问题会有如此大的影响力。

entry.tran: (用于强调程度)如此…，非常…(以至于…)
entry.def: You use such...that in order to emphasize the degree of something by mentioning the result or consequence of it.

example.ex: The weather has brought such a demand for beer that one brewery will operate over the weekend...
example.tran: 天气状况使得对啤酒的需求大增，一家啤酒厂周末要加班了。

example.ex: This is something where you can earn such a lot of money that there is not any risk that you will lose it...
example.tran: 这可以让你挣一大笔钱，而且没有任何赔钱的风险。

entry.def: You use such...that or such...as in order to say what the result or consequence of something that you have just mentioned is.

example.ex: The operation has uncovered such backstreet dealing in stolen property that police might now press for changes in the law.
example.tran: 这次行动破获了这样的地下销赃活动，现在警方可能会因此敦促修改法律。

entry.tran: (用于不想明确指出时)某，某个
entry.def: You use such and such to refer to a thing or person when you do not want to be exact or precise.

example.ex: I said, 'Well what time'll I get to Leeds?' and he said such and such a time but I missed my connection...
example.tran: 我说：“那么我什么时候才能到利兹?”他说了一个时间，但是我没赶上联运车。

example.ex: They're informed that we've got this money to spend and we will do such and such with it.
example.tran: 他们被告知我们已经拿到了这笔钱并将用它来做什么。

entry.tran: 就是这样;就是如此;就是这么回事儿
entry.def: You use such as it is or such as they are to suggest that the thing you have just mentioned is not very good, important, or useful.

example.ex: Well my toilet's all blocked up and I've got it all coming into my flat and it'll ruin my home, such as it is...
example.tran: 我的马桶堵死了，脏水全都涌到屋子里，家里脏得一塌糊涂，情况就是这样。

example.ex: The British Women's Movement, such as it is these days, came up with a programme of speeches at the House of Commons.
example.tran: 如今波澜不惊的英国妇女运动提出要在下议院发表演讲的计划。

entry.tran: (与否定词连用)严格来说，真正意义上
entry.def: You use as such with a negative to indicate that a word or expression is not a very accurate description of the actual situation.

example.ex: I am not a learner as such —I used to ride a bike years ago...
example.tran: 严格说来，我并不完全是一个初学者——几年前我经常骑自行车。

example.ex: Mark joined as an office boy at the age of fourteen with no academic qualifications as such at all...
example.tran: 马克在14岁的时候以勤杂员的身份进入公司，他当时根本就没有任何学历。

entry.def: You use as such after a noun to indicate that you are considering that thing on its own, separately from other things or factors.

example.ex: House prices are easily upset by factors which have nothing to do with property as such. The fall in prices in the South-East results largely from the high rate of interest on mortgages...
example.tran: 房价很容易受与地产本身无关的因素所影响。东南部房价的下跌很大程度上是由于抵押贷款利率的上涨所引起的。

example.ex: Mr Simon said he was not against taxes as such, 'but I do object when taxation is justified on spurious or dishonest grounds,' he says.
example.tran: 西蒙先生说他对税收本身并不反对，“但是我反对以虚假不实的理由巧立明目收税，”他说。

means.word_mean: 1. of a kind specified or understood;
2. of a degree or quality specified (by the `that' clause);

sentences.sentence: "their anxiety was such that they could not sleep"

means.word_mean: 3. of so extreme a degree or extent;

auth_sentence.content: Strangely at the time I felt no such reservations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strangely at the time I felt no such reservations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strangely at the time I felt no such reservations.

auth_sentence.content: Ms Villiers denied such a condition amounted to blackmail.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ms Villiers denied such a condition amounted to blackmail.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ms Villiers denied such a condition amounted to blackmail.

auth_sentence.content: Paupers Field sort of begs for such descriptive language.
auth_sentence.res_content: Paupers Field sort of begs for such descriptive language.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Paupers Field sort of begs for such descriptive language.

sentences.en: He spent all his money, he is such a fool.
sentences.cn: 他这样傻, 花光了所有的钱。

sentences.en: Everyone was indoors on such a night.
sentences.cn: 在这样的晚上谁都会待在室内。

means.word_mean: （强调程度）这么大的; 非常的

sentences.en: The garage did such a bad repair.
sentences.cn: 修车厂的活干得如此之差。

sentences.en: He claimed to be a scholar but was not such.
sentences.cn: 他自称是个学者, 但实际上并非如此。

sentences.en: Such are the most powerful voices of our times!
sentences.cn: 这些就是我们时代的最有力的声音！

jushi.english: He spent all his money, he is such a fool.
jushi.chinese: 他这样傻,花光了所有的钱。

jushi.english: The garage did such a bad repair.
jushi.chinese: 修车厂活干得如此之差。
